def Load(widget): entidade = widget.Entity if entidade["CALCULOGERADO"].GetBoolean(): widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPRODUTOCSV"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORFAMILIA"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORVENDAS"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CALCULAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_BAIXARNECESSIDADESPLANEJADAS"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_VOLTAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = False
status = entidade["STATUSCALCULO"].GetInt32()
if status == 5:
widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPRODUTOCSV"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORFAMILIA"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORVENDAS"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CALCULAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_BAIXARNECESSIDADESPLANEJADAS"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_VOLTAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_VISUALIZAR_RESULTADO_CALCULO"].Visible = False
if status == 3: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPRODUTOCSV"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORFAMILIA"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORVENDAS"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CALCULAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_BAIXARNECESSIDADESPLANEJADAS"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
if status == 2: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPRODUTOCSV"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORFAMILIA"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORVENDAS"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CALCULAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_BAIXARNECESSIDADESPLANEJADAS"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_VISUALIZAR_RESULTADO_CALCULO"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_VOLTAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = False
if status == 1: widget.View.Commands["CMD_VISUALIZAR_RESULTADO_CALCULO"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_VOLTAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPRODUTOCSV"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORFAMILIA"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_ADICIONARPORVENDAS"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_CALCULAR"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_BAIXARNECESSIDADESPLANEJADAS"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = True
